PreToolUse.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.filePath // empty"); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "(age-key|private_dot_ssh|encrypted_|\.env$)"; then echo "BLOCKED: Refusing to edit sensitive file: $FILE" >&2; exit 2; fi'

PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.filePath // empty"); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "\.tmpl$"; then chezmoi execute-template < "$FILE" > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo "WARNING: Template syntax error in $FILE"; fi'
